title: Brake Fluid Leak
description: A leak in the brake fluid system, which could lead to brake failure and compromise safety.

title: Generator Failure
description: The generator is not producing power, which can disrupt operations and lead to equipment downtime.

title: Oil Pressure Warning
description: Low oil pressure warning indicating potential lubrication issues that could damage the engine.

title: Fuel Injector Failure
description: Malfunctioning fuel injectors causing poor engine performance and increased emissions.

title: Transmission Fluid Leak
description: Fluid leaking from the transmission, which can lead to loss of power and shifting issues.
